snippet: A 52-year-old woman was killed and her 2-year-old niece was badly hurt when an S.U.V. ran a red light in the Richmond Hill area, crashed into a car and jumped onto a sidewalk, the authorities said.
lead_paragraph: A 52-year-old woman was killed and her 2-year-old niece was badly hurt when an S.U.V. ran a red light in the Richmond Hill area, crashed into a car and jumped onto a sidewalk, the authorities said.

headline.main: Woman Killed After S.U.V. Jumps Onto Sidewalk in Queens
